resources.string: This device does not have an ambient light sensor.
How does the light meter work?
• Uses the device’s ambient light sensor to show the illumination level in lux (lumens per square meter).
• 1 lux = 1 lumen/m². It doesn’t measure lumens directly, but lux is the standard for environmental lighting.
• 1,000+ lux: near window or outside. / 10,000+ lux: direct sunlight.
• If the sensor shows 0 or doesn\'t change, your device might not have a light sensor or it may be covered. Sudden value jumps are normal.
